Structure

Terme français Terme anglais IfcProduct + PredefinedType IfcTypeProduct + PredefinedType
Poutre Beam IfcBeam IfcBeamType BEAM
Solive Joist IfcBeam IfcBeamType JOIST
Linteau Lintel IfcBeam IfcBeamType LINTEL
Poutre en T T-Beam IfcBeam IfcBeamType T_BEAM
Poteau Column IfcColumn IfcColumnType COLUMN
Attache / fixation Fastener IfcFastener IfcFastenerType
Joint de mortier Jointing Mortar IfcFastener IfcFastenerType
Soudure Weld IfcFastener IfcFastenerType
Colle Glue IfcFastener IfcFastenerType
Fondation Footing IfcFooting n/a
Fondation Foundation IfcFooting n/a
Longrine Footing Beam IfcFooting FOOTING_BEAM n/a
Semelle isolée IfcFooting PAD_FOOTING
Pile Cap IfcFooting PILE_CAP
Semelle filante Strip Footing IfcFooting STRIP_FOOTING
Trame Grid IfcGrid
Boulon Bolt IfcMechanicalFastener IfcMechanicalFastenerType
Rondelle Washer IfcMechanicalFastener IfcMechanicalFastenerType
Fixation mécanique Mechanical Fastener IfcMechanicalFastener IfcMechanicalFastener
Clou Nail IfcMechanicalFastener IfcMechanicalFastenerType
Ecrou Nut IfcMechanicalFastener IfcMechanicalFastenerType
Rivet Rivet IfcMechanicalFastener IfcMechanicalFastenerType
Vis Screw IfcMechanicalFastener IfcMechanicalFastenerType
Entretoise / contrefiche Brace IfcMember IfcMemberType BRACE
Corde (poutre treillis) Chord IfcMember IfcMemberType CHORD
Entrait Collar IfcMember IfcMemberType COLLAR
Ossature / montant Member IfcMember IfcMemberType MEMBER
Meneau Mullion IfcMember IfcMemberType MULLION
Plat Plate IfcMember IfcMemberType PLATE
Poinçon Post IfcMember IfcMemberType POST
Panne Purlin IfcMember IfcMemberType PURLIN
Arbalétrier Rafter IfcMember IfcMemberType RAFTER
Limon Stringer IfcMember IfcMemberType STRINGER
Contrefiche ? Strut IfcMember IfcMemberType STRUT
Montant Stud IfcMember IfcMemberType STUD
Pieu Pile IfcPile n/a
Fer à béton Reinforcing Bar IfcReinforcingBar n/a
Treillis soudé Reinforcing Mesh IfcReinforcingMesh n/a
Radier Base Slab IfcSlab BASESLAB IfcSlabType BASESLAB
Plancher Floor IfcSlab FLOOR IfcSlabType FLOOR
Palier Landing IfcSlab LANDING IfcSlabType LANDING
Toiture Roof IfcSlab ROOF IfcSlabType ROOF
Tendon Tendon IfcTendon n/a
Ancrage de tendon Tendon Anchor IfcTendonAnchor n/a
Mur avec fruit Shear Wall IfcWall IfcWallType SHEAR
Mur à épaisseur constante dans la longueur IfcWall IfcWallType STANDARD
Mur à épaisseur variable dans la longueur IfcWall IfcWallType POLYGONAL
Mur composé de différents éléments (ex: ossature bois) IfcWall IfcWallType ELEMENTEDWALL
Mur Wall IfcWall IfcWallType *
